name: Kritika
wishText: Happy Valentine's Day! You've officially been upgraded from 'Wife' to 'Super-Mom-to-be'. Warning: System may experience sudden reboots for pickles and ice cream. I'm ready to be your 24/7 technical support (and foot massager). ‚ù§Ô∏è
testimony: Code Review Status: 100% Perfect. Our family's production release is looking like our best work yet!
outroText: I love you (and our little 'junior dev') so much!
